verbose_text: Expression of IFN-gamma, TNF-alpha, and granzyme B by stimulated MAIT cells from a representative donor is shown in XREF_FIG D. IL-15 (50 ng/mL), TL1A (100 ng/mL), or the combination of both markedly promoted IL-12 (2 ng/mL)/IL-18 (50 ng/mL)-induced MAIT cell activation, measured by MAIT cell expression of IFN-gamma, TNF-alpha, GrB, and CD69 (XREF_FIG E-1H).
